meanings.definition: A new version of a musical recording produced by remixing.
meanings.sent1: I love listening to remixes of my favorite songs.
meanings.sent2: The DJ played several remixes at the party last night.
meanings.sent3: The remixes of the song made everyone dance at the concert.
meanings.sent4: Her remixes of classic tracks brought a fresh vibe to the music scene.
meanings.sent5: The remixes added a modern twist to the old tunes, making them more exciting.

meanings.definition: To create a new version of a musical recording by remixing.
meanings.sent1: She remixes popular songs to give them a unique sound.
meanings.sent2: The producer remixes tracks to appeal to a wider audience.
meanings.sent3: He remixes music in his studio, turning ordinary songs into hits.
meanings.sent4: Remixing songs remixes the listener's experience, making it more enjoyable.
meanings.sent5: The artist remixes melodies with creativity, producing amazing results.
